MAN.TITLE: genmarkov
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: generates random markov matrix with recurrent and transient classes

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : integer row vector (its dimension is the number of recurrent classes).
: real Markov matrix. Sum of entries in each row should add to one.
: string 'perm'. If given, a random permutation of the states is done.

DESCRIPTION.P: Returns in M a random Markov transition probability matrix with size(rec,1) recurrent classes with rec(1),...rec($) entries respectively and tr transient states.
